trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Stellt Daten für das <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged" />-Ereignis und das <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged" />-Ereignis bereit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs> data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> that raised the event, the anchor or cargo resource associated with the event, and the action that was taken - <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs> Daten enthalten die <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> , die das Ereignis und die Aktion, die erstellt wurde – zugeordnete Ereignis, das Inhaltsanker oder eine Ladungsressource Ressource ausgelöst <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, oder <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.

trans-unit.source: The annotation that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Die Anmerkung, die das Ereignis ausgelöst hat.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" /> resource of the event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource)" /> class.
<paramref name="action" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction" /> value.
Gets the action of the annotation <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Aktion der <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource" /> für die Anmerkung ab.
Die Aktion der <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource" /> für die Anmerkung.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> is called when an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource is <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> wird aufgerufen, wenn ein <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> oder <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> Ressource ist <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, oder <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Ruft das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> ab, das das Ereignis ausgelöst hat.
Das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" />, das das Ereignis ausgelöst hat.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" /> resource associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die dem Ereignis zugeordnete <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" />- oder <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" />-Ressource ab.

trans-unit.source: The annotation anchor or cargo resource that was <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified" />.
trans-unit.target: Der Anmerkungsanker oder die Ladungsressource, die <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed" /> oder <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified" /> wurde.
